item.title: 据说道达尔能源公司正在酝酿亚洲可再生能源资产方案
item.description: 据知情人士透露，道达尔能源公司（TotalEnergies SE）正在考虑出售亚洲的一些可再生能源资产，以帮助减少债务。【原文：TotalEnergies SE is considering selling some renewable energy assets in Asia to help to reduce debt, people familiar with the matter said.】

item.title: 力拓暂停塞尔维亚旗舰项目贾达尔锂项目
item.description: 据一份内部文件显示，力拓集团已终止了备受争议的价值 29.5 亿美元的塞尔维亚贾达尔（Jadar）锂矿项目。【原文：Rio Tinto Group has mothballed the controversial $2.95 billion Jadar lithium project in Serbia, according to an internal note.】

item.title: 全球石油供应过剩在美国市场表现最为突出
item.description: 全球原油市场供过于求，这在美洲尤其是美国最为明显。【原文：Global crude oil markets are oversupplied, and it’s most obvious in the Americas, especially the US.】

item.title: 马科斯誓言在丑闻曝光后增加菲律宾国家开支
item.description: 菲律宾总统小费迪南德-马科斯（Ferdinand Marcos Jr.）表示，他的政府将增加因腐败丑闻而受阻的公共开支。【原文：Philippine President Ferdinand Marcos Jr. said his administration will ramp up public spending which was hampered by a corruption scandal.】

item.title: 随着市场趋紧，中国将提供稀有铂库存数据
item.description: 广州期货交易所在推出中国首个贵金属衍生品市场时，将公布铂金和钯金库存的详细情况，为了解需求提供难得的机会。【原文：The Guangzhou Futures Exchange will publish details of platinum and palladium stockpiles when it launches China’s first derivatives market for the precious metals, offering a rare insight into demand.】

item.title: 日本交易所正在研究如何遏制囤积加密货币的公司
item.description: 随着人们对加密货币囤积狂潮造成的损失的担忧加深，日本交易所集团公司正在酝酿限制上市数字资产财务公司发展的措施。【原文：Japan Exchange Group Inc. is mulling measures to limit the growth of listed digital-asset treasury companies, as concerns deepen over losses connected to the crypto hoarding frenzy.】

item.title: 印度大市场初现改善迹象
item.description: 在交易日开始之前，我们为您带来可能影响市场的重要新闻和事件摘要。今天我们关注【原文：Before the trading day starts we bring you a digest of the key news and events that are likely to move markets. Today we look at:】

item.title: Blackstone 的 AirTrunk 将下一个数据中心瞄准印度
item.description: AirTrunk 是 Blackstone Inc. 去年以 240 亿澳元（160 亿美元）收购的澳大利亚数据中心运营商，其创始人兼首席执行官 Robin Khuda 表示，AirTrunk 将在印度建设下一个设施，以帮助满足该行业的巨大需求。【原文：AirTrunk, the Australian data-center operator bought by Blackstone Inc. last year for A$24 billion ($16 billion), will build its next facility in India to help meet overwhelming demand in the sector, said founder and Chief Executive Officer Robin Khuda.】

item.title: 苏黎世保险向亚太地区私人债务投资 1.7 亿美元
item.description: 苏黎世保险集团股份有限公司（Zurich Insurance Group AG）选择澳大利亚作为其亚太地区私人信贷战略的首个市场，授予其 1.7 亿美元的授权，以寻求投资当地资产的机会。【原文：Zurich Insurance Group AG has selected Australia as the first market for its private credit strategy in Asia-Pacific, awarding a $170 million mandate as it seeks opportunities to invest in local assets.】

item.title: 马来西亚林吉特接近四年高点，经济势头强劲
item.description: 马来西亚林吉特是今年亚洲表现最好的货币，随着经济势头的增强和全球贸易紧张局势的缓解，海外投资者纷纷转向本地债务，马来西亚林吉特正接近四年来的最高点。【原文：The Malaysian ringgit, Asia’s best-performing currency this year, is nearing a four-year high as strengthening economic momentum and easing global trade tensions drive offshore investors to local debt.】

item.title: 中国将面临 "后危机时代 "以来最长的消费放缓期
item.description: 自四年多前科维德事件后的反弹失去动力以来，中国的消费增长正走向最长时间的放缓，这凸显了政府关于支持内需的言论如何难以与现实相匹配。【原文：China is heading for its longest slowdown in consumption growth since its post-Covid rebound lost steam more than four years ago, underscoring how the government’s rhetoric about supporting domestic demand has struggled to match reality.】

item.title: 全球投资者抛售本地股票，韩元将创 2009 年以来最弱走势
item.description: 韩元正接近 2009 年以来的最弱水平，这给央行增加了保护货币的压力。【原文：The South Korean won is approaching its weakest level since 2009, adding pressure to the central bank to protect the currency.】

item.title: 澳大利亚失业率下降支持澳大利亚央行暂停加息呼吁
item.description: 澳大利亚 10 月份失业率下降，经济增加的就业岗位多于预期，这表明劳动力市场依然紧张，储备银行维持利率不变的决定是正确的。【原文：Australian unemployment declined in October and the economy added more jobs than anticipated, suggesting the labor market remains tight and vindicating the Reserve Bank’s decision to leave interest rates unchanged.】

item.title: 经济停滞不前，新西兰公民出境人数创新高
item.description: 截至 9 月份的 12 个月里，新西兰公民出国人数创下历史新高，因为疲软的经济迫使更多的人到海外寻找薪酬更高的工作。【原文：New Zealand saw a record number of citizens depart in the 12 months through September as a sluggish economy forces more people to look offshore for better paying jobs.】

item.title: 新世界投资者观摩竞争对手博弈 19 亿美元计划
item.description: 债券投资者在权衡香港最大的房地产开发商之一提出的重要交换要约时，面临着一个典型的博弈论困境：他们的最佳选择取决于其他人怎么做。【原文：Bond investors weighing up a crucial exchange offer by one of Hong Kong’s biggest property developers face a classic game theory dilemma: their best option depends on what everyone else does.】

item.title: 美国经济数据不佳，黄金保持涨势
item.description: 黄金在上一交易日上涨近2%后持稳，因为交易商权衡了美国经济前景的不确定性，而缺乏可靠数据又加剧了这种不确定性。【原文：Gold was steady after rising almost 2% in the previous session, as traders weighed an uncertain US economic outlook that’s been compounded by an absence of reliable data.】

item.title: 新加坡债券将因供应收紧、流动性增加而上涨
item.description: 据巴克莱银行（Barclays Plc）称，新加坡政府债券在今年年底前的需求可能会上升。【原文：Singapore’s government bonds may see elevated demand through the end of the year, according to Barclays Plc.】

item.title: 日本货币暴跌加剧关于干预的争论
item.description: 随着日元汇率跌向以前吸引政府入市的水平，交易员们越来越怀疑日本新政府能否通过直接干预来支撑日元。【原文：Traders are increasingly skeptical that Japan’s new government will be able to shore up the yen by direct intervention as the currency slumps toward levels that previously drew authorities into the market.】

item.title: 中国打击亚马逊和电子商务网站卖家逃税行为
item.description: 据熟悉内情的人士透露，中国税务部门首次命令包括亚马逊公司在内的电子商务巨头交出销售数据，此举实属罕见，旨在打击利用在线平台开展跨境业务的商家的逃税行为。【原文：Chinese tax authorities ordered e-commerce giants including Amazon.com Inc. to hand over sales data for the first time, according to people familiar with the matter, in a rare move to crack down on tax evasion by merchants who use the online platforms for cross-border business.】

item.title: DroneShield 因首席执行官沃尼克抛售股票而创下 2024 年以来最大跌幅
item.description: 在首席执行官奥列格-沃尼克（Oleg Vornik）剥离了 4950 万澳元（3240 万美元）的股份后，DroneShield Ltd. 的股价暴跌。【原文：DroneShield Ltd.’s stock plunged after Chief Executive Officer Oleg Vornik divested A$49.5 million ($32.4 million) in shares.】

item.title: 石油暴跌 4%，盈余迹象显现，跌幅扩大
item.description: 周三，一系列迹象表明，期待已久的石油过剩终于来临。【原文：Oil extended a decline after slumping on Wednesday on a flurry of signs that a long-awaited surplus has finally arrived.】

item.title: 游戏提振盈利，腾讯 2,800 亿美元涨势或将延续
item.description: 由于人工智能行业可能出现泡沫，人们对科技股集中度的担忧与日俱增，投资者纷纷涌入腾讯控股有限公司（Tencent Holdings Ltd. ）的股票，以寻求更安全的投资机会。【原文：As fears grow over concentration in technology stocks amid a possible bubble in the artificial intelligence trade, investors are piling into Tencent Holdings Ltd. shares as a safer bet.】

item.title: 在 "充满挑战 "的市场环境下，GrainCorp 全年净利润低于预期
item.description: 澳大利亚商品出口商谷物公司（GrainCorp Ltd.）的全年盈利大幅低于预期，该公司指出，在全球供应过剩和需求疲软的情况下，市场 "充满挑战"。【原文：Australian commodities exporter GrainCorp Ltd. significantly missed estimates for full-year earnings, with the company pointing to a “challenging” market amid a global supply glut and weak demand.】

item.title: 阿根廷向国际货币基金组织增资 8.7 亿美元指向美国援助
item.description: 上个月，阿根廷在国际货币基金组织（International Monetary Fund）的持股跃升，与美国政府资产的下降幅度相同，因为来自该贷款机构的数据可能表明，美国将向哈维尔-米莱（Javier Milei）政府提供新形式的金融援助。【原文：Argentina’s holdings at the International Monetary Fund jumped last month by the same amount that the US government’s assets declined, as data from the lender could indicate a new form of US financial aid to Javier Milei’s government.】

item.title: 巴西银行因预期贷款损失而下调利润预期
item.description: 由于第三季度信贷成本增长速度超过预期，巴西银行（Banco do Brasil SA）缩减了今年的利润预期。【原文：Banco do Brasil SA has pared back its profit estimates for this year as credit costs increased at a faster-than-expected pace in the third quarter.】

item.title: CD&R 探索收购包装公司 Sealed Air
item.description: 知情人士透露，Clayton Dubilier & Rice 正在探索收购希悦尔公司（Sealed Air Corp.【原文：Clayton Dubilier & Rice is exploring a potential acquisition of Sealed Air Corp., the packaging company that invented Bubble Wrap, people with knowledge of the matter said.】

item.title: 亚洲交易员态度谨慎，数据空白令前景蒙上阴影：市场综述
item.description: 在华尔街摇摆不定之后，周四亚洲股市可能难以找到方向，因为投资者在获得关键经济数据有限的情况下权衡美联储的政策前景。【原文：Asian stocks may struggle for direction on Thursday after Wall Street wavered, as investors weighed the Federal Reserve’s policy outlook amid limited access to key economic data.】

item.title: 民主党人找到了名为 "可负担性 "的有力政治武器
item.description:
在本周的《特朗普经济学》 中，我们将讨论党如何利用唐纳德-特朗普的竞选主题来对抗他，从而横扫非年度选举。【原文：

On this week’s Trumponomics, we discuss how the party swept off-year elections by using Donald Trump’s campaign theme against him.

】

item.title: 韩国芯片巨头的唯一 "卖出 "分析师警告人工智能过盛
item.description: 一位对 SK Hynix Inc. 和三星电子公司（Samsung Electronics Co., Ltd.）均给予卖出评级的分析师表示，韩国芯片股的估值已达到难以自圆其说的水平，使其很容易因轻微挫折而大幅下跌。【原文：South Korean chip stocks have reached levels where valuations are difficult to justify, leaving them vulnerable to sharp declines on minor setbacks, according to an analyst with sell ratings on both SK Hynix Inc. and Samsung Electronics Co.】

item.title: Khazanah 旗下公司将利用大量土地为数据中心供电
item.description: 马来西亚主权财富基金卡扎纳国民有限公司（Khazanah Nasional Bhd.）的基础设施部门UEM集团（UEM Group Bhd.）董事总经理阿姆兰-哈菲兹-阿菲福丁（Amran Hafiz Affifudin）表示，该公司计划利用其持有的大量土地提供清洁能源和工业用地，以满足柔佛州南部耗电量大的数据中心的需求。【原文：Malaysian sovereign wealth fund Khazanah Nasional Bhd.’s infrastructure arm UEM Group Bhd. plans to use its vast land holdings to supply clean energy and industrial land to accommodate power-hungry data centers in the southern state of Johor, said Managing Director Amran Hafiz Affifudin.】
